sentences.en: Asha , the Primordial Dragon of Order creates the world by giving It'shape and purpose.
sentences.cn: 太初秩序之龙阿沙创造了这个世界并给了它形状和目的.

sentences.en: But that doesn't mean that these chemicals might be feeding primordial microorganisms on the moon's surface.
sentences.cn: 但这并不意味着它们可以哺育月球表面的微生物体.

sentences.en: Could the Universal Primordial Flux become contaminated?
I was alone, floating, apparently, in the mind of a gray primordial vastness.
sentences.cn: 显然, 我象是在灰暗的原始的浩淼之中,独个儿漂浮着.

sentences.en: It is the primordial force that propels us forward.
sentences.cn: 它是推动我们前进的原始动力。

sentences.en: Let us imagine the primordial din, the original vortex!
sentences.cn: 让我们臆想那本初的喧嚣 、 元始的漩涡!
生命的根本真实性是精神.

sentences.en: Objective : To isolate and clone bovine embryonic cells from bovine fetus Primordial germ cells ( PGCs ) .
sentences.cn: 目的从牛原始生殖细胞中分离 克隆牛 胚胎干细胞.

sentences.en: Rahim sees this as a manifestation of the Divine and primordial connection between mother and son.
sentences.cn: 拉欣认为这显示了母子之间神圣而原始的感情联系.

sentences.en: Sense of smell? Smells are the primordial language and the newborn perceives them indistinctly from birth.
sentences.cn: 嗅觉 - 嗅觉气味是最原始的语言,但新生儿对它并不容易察觉.

sentences.en: The fragments may well have been primordial planetesimals, according to Weaver.
sentences.cn: 维沃认为,这些碎片是最原始的星子.

sentences.en: The Neanderthal Man is one of our primordial ancestors.
sentences.cn: 的尼安德特人是我们的原始祖先.

sentences.en: Twenty million years ago, Idaho was not the arid place it is now. Rather, it was warm and damp, populated by dense primordial forest.
sentences.cn: 2,000万年前，爱达荷州并不像现在这样干旱。相反，那时的爱达荷州温暖潮湿，有大片的原始森林。

sentences.en: Twenty million years ago, Idaho was populated by dense primordial forest.
sentences.cn: 2,000万年前，爱达荷州到处都是茂密的原始森林。

sentences.en: Two hours before admission, the patient had severe persistent primordial pain.
sentences.cn: 入院前2小时患者感到严重持续性心前区疼痛.

words.tran_cn: 原始的，远古的；简单的，粗糙的
原始主义；尚古主义；原始的风格

trans.tran_en: existing at the beginning of time or the beginning of the Earth
